title: Sound On: DeSantis vs. Disney, New Ukraine Military Aid
itunes:title: Sound On: DeSantis vs. Disney, New Ukraine Military Aid
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.
Guests: Retired Brigadier General Mark Kimmitt, Congressman Matt Cartwright of Pennsylvania, Bloomberg politics contributor Rick Davis and former Florida Congressman Jim Davis 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
